title: Super Darling is Dead
sinopse:
He was an elite from the big city who had status, money, and women. However, when an investment in a share-house fails, he loses everything! At his lowest point of despair, he meets Tao, a brazen, young gay man who runs a share-house. "If you pretend to be a couple with me, I can help you." To take back his elite life and lost pride, as well as gain the know-how of running a share-house, he has to accept Tao's insane conditions!?

(Source: Tokuma Shoten, translated)
